chat_global_error_unkown: Oh no! Something went wrong. This error has been carefully recorded and our nerd is working on it to fix it. Please try again later.
chat_command_about_desc: Displays some information about the bot.
chat_command_avatar_desc: Retrieves the profile picture of the provided user ID.
chat_command_avatar_err_noUser: Sorry, but there is no user on this server with the information provided.
chat_command_checkme_desc: This comamnd is used in checkin.
chat_command_eval_desc: Command used to run snippets of code. [ADMINISTRATOR ONLY]
chat_command_help_desc: Displays the help of usable commands for the corrent user.
chat_command_help_embed_desc: For additional Info, please ask `Phil | Flipper#3621`
chat_command_lookup_desc: Uses the Discord API to lookup userinformaiton.
